configuration.dashboardSubtitle: India's Contributions, Global Context & Institutional Landscape

summary.title: Executive Summary: Impact at a Glance
insights: India's ML researchers are making their mark with 42 papers at ICML 2025, including 0 spotlight and 0 oral presentations that demonstrate the quality of research.
Positioned globally, India contributes 1.3% to the body of work at ICML 2025.
Analysis of 23 first authorship and 19 majority authorship collaborations reveals trends in research leadership and international collaboration.
The India ML research landscape shows a mix of 10 academic and 1 corporate contributions, with leading institutions demonstrating significant research impact.

context.title: Global & APAC Context: India's Standing
context.subtitle: Comparing India's research output with global and regional peers.
insights: The top 5 contributing countries were: United States, China, GB, SG, HK.

focusCountry.title: India Deep Dive
focusCountry.subtitle: Analyzing authorship, collaboration, and institutional contributions.
insights: India had 101 unique authors contributing to ICML 2025.
23 papers had a first author from India.
19 papers had a majority of authors from India.

institutions.title: Institutions: Internal Ecosystem
institutions.subtitle: Analyzing the performance and impact of individual institutions within India.
insights: Indian Institute of Science was the top contributing institution from India with 8 papers.
India had 10 academic and 1 corporate institutions contributing to ICML 2025.
